description: Information about the Application through which this resource was accessed. This information is based on the token used to acces this resource. http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/#/Portal_Self/02r3000001m7000000/
title: portalAppInfo

appID.description: The AppID of the registered Application. This is also the OAuth client_id

itemId.description: The item ID of the registered Application

orgId.description: The organization to which the Application owner belongs
